page.title: 03LOCAL HISTORY-THE SPA
page.content: A spa is a place where people go to drink or bathe in water which has special mineral qualities. John Parkinson accidentally discovered the spring at Woodhall in the late nineteenth century while looking for coal.Soon a village was built and it became a very popular place with some notable hotels.Places of entertainment such as the cinema and the park were built.Many of the visitors to the spa were people suffering from illnesses, especially the elderly.They thought that if they bathed in the water or drank it they would soon get better. Today the spa baths have closed down due to the recent collapse of part of their structure.
